jump_scares.spoiler: A vehicle suddenly crashes into Michelle’s car
A loud noise startles Michelle
Howard bangs his fist on the table loudly
A disfigured woman bangs on the window
A loud gunshot may startle some viewers

A knife once again pierces the air vent
Michelle runs over the mailbox
A Facehugger jumps out of the egg and lands on Kane’s helmet
Dallas accidentally kicks something over, causing Ripley to cry out in surprise
The Facehugger drops onto Ripley’s shoulder
The Facehugger twitches as Ash pokes it
Blood spurts out of Kane’s chest and a few seconds later an alien bursts out of it
A cat hisses and runs away
The alien comes into view behind Brett
An alien appears in front of Dallas. [Video]
Ash grabs Parker
The cat jumps out at Ripley
An alien hand extends out in front of Ripley
A neomorph opens its mouth and violently attacks Rosenthal
Oram suddenly shoots the neomorph

Blood explodes out of Oram’s torso
David disables Walter
A facehugger jumps out at Cole
There is a brief cut during the opening credits where a glass capsule cracks (another cut at 2:46 where an explosion occurs may also startle viewers)
Quick cut during the sermon as the alien attempts to break out from inside the box (it finally breaks out at 29:33)
Quick cut during the sermon as the alien attempts to break out from inside the box (it finally breaks out at 29:33)
Quick cut during the sermon as the alien attempts to break out from inside the box (it finally breaks out at 29:33)

Rains sees the alien

The alien pulls Andrew into the vent above

The alien appears in front of an inmate
The alien suddenly leaps out of the molten lead
One of the Heptapods places a tentacle on the barrier near where Louise is standing
During a dream where Louise is talking to Ian in her room, Louise looks up and Ian has been replaced by a Heptapod
The Heptapod places a tentacle on the barrier causing Louise and Ian to be pushed back by an unseen force
A dog runs towards Darrin
Darrin turns the camera and is startled by Raid
Darrin is startled by a water stream
A loud bang
The original Em suddenly appears crawling in the hallway
Child suddenly suffocated
Cutting of an abdomen and Human organ manipulation
Threading needles into lips and mouth
Sudden unzipping of abdomen
Quick camera close up of cutting into side of foot and bone
Two sudden drills pulled out and drilling to the head
Whitley jumps out at his wife Anne from behind a wall to scare her as a joke
There is a sudden flash of light accompanied by a loud sound
The curtains are suddenly pulled open by alien hands
A person in a Halloween costume jumps out from behind a table
A floating robot glides into the room, followed by a cut to it quickly flying towards Whitley
Whitley suddenly jolts awake from the hypnosis and begins to scream
The house lights turn on by themselves
The headlights of Ward’s car come on
Theresa screams “Look out!” and there is a cut to a mutilated looking G-Spot (the name of the cat) shrieking on the road
Lavinia is pulled backwards by Nathan
After calling out Lavinia’s name, there is a sudden cut to Theresa crawling towards her
A distressed woman appears on screen
Bright lights flash accompanied by loud sound effects
The telephone booth crashes down behind the shop attendant
April walks backwards into a masked man holding an axe
The lights turn off suddenly
The fuse box sparks
Loud banging can be heard from upstairs
A flash of lightning illuminates an alien outside walking towards the house
Lex is suddenly lifted into the alien ship
On some camera footage, a girl is suddenly abducted into the alien ship
A woman bursts out of a closet
Travis grabs Seth and puts a knife to his neck
An alien silhouette appears behind Travis
Travis, who is hiding underneath a bed, sees some alien feet
An alien hand grabs Travis around the face
A bang can be heard from the other side of the door
April looks through the peep hole in the door and sees an alien eye
A loud noise startles the sheriff
An alien runs quickly past the sheriff
The sheriff turns the car lights on to reveal an alien standing in front of the car
April appears by the car window beside Seth
There is a loud noise and a red light illuminates the room
After a momentary silence there is a loud noise and flashing blue lights
The floor boards begin to break up
Seth is attacked by an alien
Kyle approaches a mirror, suddenly an alien hand bursts through and grabs him
Something sparks near April
The power suddenly comes back on
The probe device suddenly opens
The alien/human hybrid opens its eyes
Sophia sees Courtney on the other side of the elevator
Courtney quickly opens the shower curtain during a tense scene
A coprse appears in the bathtub from under the shower curtain
A hand appears on the window of the wrecked car that Courtney is looking through
A few short cuts to the car crash may startle some viewers
Jamie’s girlfriend appears behind him briefly before the phone rings
Loud static comes out of the radio
Courtney tries to leave down the fire escape but Tessa appears in front of her
While swimming, Marlo has a flashback to her “flatlining” experience where she is floating face down in the water
Marlo looks up and sees the word “MURDERER” written on the morgue cabinet
A corpse appears behind Marlo
The radio crackles into life
All the cabinets on Jamie’s boat suddenly open
Jamie sees his ex-girlfriend
A hand reaches out and touches Jamie’s shoulder
Jamie is stabbed in the hand as he tries to climb out of the water
As the elevator door begins to close, Sophia briefly sees the girl from her class
Marlo is suddenly suffocated with a plastic bag
The corpse suddenly grabs Marlo around the throat
Marlo is suddenly lifted in the air and thrown backwards by an unseen force
Several compartments suddenly come out of the sphere with a loud mechanical noise
The alien child suddenly spits a strange goo over the group

Kishimoto suddenly tackles the alien from the side
Several compartments once again suddenly come out of Gantz
The presumably dead alien jumps back up behind Kato
The alien loudly implodes
The large statue implodes, sending rocks flying everywhere
The statue suddenly begins to move, attacking Kurono with its swords
As the statue’s reflection slowly becomes visible, it attacks, shattering the glass
The statue suddenly begins to attack at extreme speed
Sebastian suddenly begins to spasm
A hand reaches out and touches Linda while she is sleeping
Sebastian begins to move violently
Sarah wakens suddenly
Linda’s bedroom window breaks
Invisible Sebastian suddenly starts talking directly in front of Dr. Kramer
Accompanied by a sound effect, Linda bumps into Sebastian
Through the thermal goggles Janice sees Sebastian burst through the door and attack her
A hand grabs Linda around the ankle
The sudden buzzing of an alarm clock may startle some people
Elizabeth puts her hand on Matthew’s shoulder, startling him
The mutating body suddenly opens it’s eyes
Matthew points at Nancy and lets out a scream, revealing that he has been converted into a pod person. [Video]
A pig suddenly runs past the screen
After apparently leaving, the Indominus rex suddenly crashes through the garage where Claire and Owen are hiding
A man places his bloodied hand on the back window, startling Claire
A Velociraptor breaks through the window while Claire is driving
A Velociraptor appears beside Hoskins
Maisie jumps out at her nanny (as a joke)
Some small raptors run out of the abandoned car as Owen approaches it, a few seconds later a larger raptor jumps on the car
The Indoraptor suddenly clamps on to Wheatley’s arm
The Indoraptor suddenly tackles one of the armed guards as Eli talks to Claire and Owen
Accompanied by a sound effect, we see the dead guard suddenly pulled out of sight
The fighting Raptors break the window in front of Owen and Maisie as they scale the side of the house
A T-Rex suddenly ambushes Eli as he bends down to pick up the DNA sample
A burning moose jumped in the shot
The whisperer’s mouth abruptly opens, releasing blinding lights onto John
There is a loud gunshot during a quiet scene
Skip opens the car door, breaking Amy out of her daze
As Morgan walks towards Amy, Lee suddenly appears in view behind Morgan
Metal horse gets spit out by Jean Jacket onto Oj’s car
The scene abruptly cuts to Corporal Bower struggling in his hyper-sleep chamber
A hyper-sleep chamber drops down, accompanied by a loud noise
Bower shines his torch on a dead person hanging by some rope. [Video]
The mystery girl attacks Bower
The hanging body is suddenly pulled up
Something runs past Bower
A monster tries to attack Bower through a grate
A child’s face appears beside Bower during a scene transition
A hanging man suddenly opens his eyes as Bower gets close to him. [Video]
The monsters start screaming from above Bower
A monster lunges at Bower
A monster jumps down on Nadia
Payton closes a cabinet door which reveals Gallo standing behind it
A flock of birds fly out at Billy as he sees several flayed corpses hanging in the trees
Dillon almost runs into Mac
Blood splatters on Blaine’s shoulder
The Predator is suddenly caught in the net just as Dutch begins to turn back
Mac puts his hand over Dillon’s mouth
The Predator shoots a laser at Poncho from the trees
The Predator traps Dutch’s head between two spikes that come out of its arm
The Engineer’s head explodes
Accompanied by a sound effect, something falls off one of the dead creatures that Filfield and Milburn are examining
Meredith is startled by Janek playing a note on his accordion
The snake-like creature latches onto Milburn’s hand
One of the snake-like creatures shoots out of Milburn’s mouth
Dr. Shaw suddenly jumps off the operating table
One of the giant alien’s arms appears in front of the door that Dr. Shaw is looking through
The cat jumps up at Dan’s face
The body suddenly jolts upwards and begins yelling
Megan’s father abruptly hits his head on the window behind Megan
A hand breaks through the door while Dan and Megan are talking
Alice gets grabbed from behind the doorway
Dr. Blue jumps down at Rain while she is fixing the power
A body falls out from behind the door
Inside a liquid-containing tank, a body wakes up abruptly
A zombie slams against the window from the other side
Hands grab through some grating on the side of the tunnel
A silhouette walks past the screen
As the crew explore the Icarus I, something dislodges from the ship and makes a loud bang
Icarus II abruptly disengages from Icarus I
Pinbacker suddenly attacks Capa
Pinbacker impales Corazon with a scalpel
An abrupt cut to Mace crying out as he climbs out of the coolant reservoir may startle some viewers
Pinbacker grunts loudly and punches through a glass wall
A strange shrieking noise resounds through the spaceship
Tam puts her head up to the wall, after several seconds silence we hear the shrieking noise again accompanied by a thud from the other side of the wall
A section of wall is removed to reveal a screaming woman who appears to be fused to the wiring of the space ship
The Foosball figures start to spin rapidly by themselves
Accompanied by a sound effect, Volkov’s eye moves while he is looking in the mirror
Worms suddenly burst out of Volkov’s mouth
The wall panel suddenly traps Mundy’s arm
A monster bursts through the clouds
Evan suddenly appears in the kitchen holding a knife
A bright camera flash may startle some viewers
Evan’s dad is suddenly on top of Evan strangling him
Lenny forcefully pushes Evan up against a wall
A loud gunshot interrupts a quiet scene
Aaron is about to jump off the boat to find Justin when Justin suddenly surfaces
Justin sees Carl’s body hanging from the roof when another copy of Carl suddenly starts yelling from behind him
Carl suddenly bursts through the door behind Justin
There is a loud bang and the projector is flung into the air
Carl bursts through the door
A peaceful scene is interrupted by a car driving past at speed
A car slams into the car that Telly and Ash are in
Agent Petalis is suddenly sucked through the roof at great speed by an unseen force. [Video]
Anne Pope is sucked off the ground and disappears into the sky. [Video]
While chasing Sam, Telly runs around a corner and sees the agent standing in front of her
The agent’s face suddenly distorts and the windows around him blow out
The agent grabs Telly around the neck
The agent is sucked through the roof of the hangar

movies.title: The Girl with All the Gifts

jump_scares.spoiler: The sound of a door opening may startle some viewers
A child suddenly lunges at the Sergeant
An infected child attacks Kieran

Mary gasps and appears shocked to see her husband sitting beside her bed
John turns over in bed and has a vision of his wife lying in the bed beside him
John smashes his head into the mirror. [Video]
Lars scares Derek by shouting “boo” from behind him
The creature suddenly escapes from the block of ice. [Video]
One of The Thing’s tentacles shoots out and impales Henrik
As Lars enters a building, he is grabbed by something and pulled inside

The Thing bursts through a window in front of Carter
One of The Thing’s tentacles suddenly lashes out at Kate as she inches towards the grenade
Kate jumps out of a box to scare Matt as a joke
While Kate is lowering a dead bird into the soil, some objects suddenly fall down on the ground right behind her
While Matt is touching a wall, Kate suddenly calls out to him, frightening him and causing him to jump
Matt opens the door, frightening Shane and causing him to drop the snow globe and shatter it
After Matt says “It’s not loaded,” Shane suddenly fires the gun to the ground as a warning

Norris and Nauls attack MacReady from behind

A raccoon makes a noise
